title: Embodiment of Day Town Killings

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Day Vigilante (30)
-Day Veteran (2189)
-Day Vampire Hunter (2193)
-The Day Jailor (2197)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-May use up to 2 abilities per day/night.
-Any specifics of your abilities, such as charges, cooldown, and other, dont apply
-You do __not__ have Guilt.
-Your kills will appear as the role you used the ability of.
